attacks.name: Go For the Throat
attacks.description: ${attackDamageMinValue0}% of your min hit to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit

attacks.name: Careful Swing
attacks.description: gives you +${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Damage Reduction for ${onHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turns

attacks.name: Disorientating Crack
attacks.description: gives the enemy +${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Attack Interval for ${onHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turns

attacks.name: Sweaping Wind
attacks.description: gives you -${preHitEffect0modValue0}s Attack Interval until the end of the attack

attacks.name: Heavy Blow
attacks.description: ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit gives you +${preHitEffect0modValue0}s Attack Interval until the end of the attack

attacks.name: Called Shot
attacks.description: <damagegives you +${preHitEffect0modValue0}s Attack Interval until the end of the attack>

attacks.name: Hunter's Bluff
attacks.description: Deals no damage but incresses attack speed

attacks.name: Burn
attacks.description: has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Burn that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0} damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s

attacks.name: Corrode
attacks.description: has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Poison that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0} damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s

attacks.name: Bleed
attacks.description: has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Bleed that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0} damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s

attacks.name: Web
attacks.description: has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to Slow the enemy for 10 rounds

attacks.name: Stun
attacks.description: has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to Stun the enemy for 3 rounds

attacks.name: Tripple Threat
attacks.description: has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict a Burn, a Poison, and/or a Bleed that each deal ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0} damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s

attacks.name: Flashbang
attacks.description: Reduce the enemy's accuracy by 20% for 10 rounds
